amendment.description: To strike the appropriate balance between protecting workers and protecting religious freedom.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2013, under the order of 11/6/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 230.

action.text: Amendment SA 2013 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Toomey.
Proposed amendment SA 2013 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2013 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Toomey to Amendment SA 2012.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2013, under the order of 11/6/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 230.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2013, under the order of 11/6/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 230.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2013 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Toomey.
